person.persName: John W. Gray (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary T. Gray. Father of Sarah C. Gray, William B. Gray, and Susan H. Gray. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850 and 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860, three as a guardian for Mary Gray. Mary Gray owned an additional five enslaved persons.
